name: Danz Borin (V)
Lore: 'Cocky gunner and bounty hunter. Maintains a residence on Nar Shaddaa, the spaceport moon of the Hutt homeworld. To his companions'' delight, he''s nearly as good as he boasts.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. May add 1 to Force drains at same Nal Hutta location. Danz is a matching pilot for any [Independent Starship] starship and while piloting one, may not draw more than one battle destiny here (your battle destinies here may not be canceled or modified by opponent).(Original concept by Tyler Vastag - Twin Cities V-Lite 2006)',
